channel.title: Im genuinely fed up!
channel.description:
I only get 3 different classes. Im either Sheriff, NK or Phys/Alch.
Every single game. I just spent 4 games IN A ROW as reaper and possessor!!
There is something wrong with the randomizing of the roles because this is just every single game. I might get lucky and after 20 games I end up CW or King, but its so rare that it doesnt even matter.
I love this game but there is seriously and issue with the randomizing and I cant deal with this anymore. It gets me so upset that I end up wanting to throw or leave.
Im about to get reported in the game I am playing RN because its my fourth NK game and I just dont want to deal with it. I am getting penalized for your poor randomizing system and THAT is not fair.
![3|690x342](upload://eZduCe8LOQNFFgqk9uIVtQhKr8Z.PNG)

item.title: Im genuinely fed up!
item.dc:creator: AshKiwii
item.description:
Stats are in, thank you my good sir.

— Prince PlayCount 29
Princess PlayCount 10
Paladin PlayCount 8
CourtWizard PlayCount 8
Knight PlayCount 4
Observer PlayCount 14
Butler PlayCount 9
Assassin PlayCount 12
Mastermind PlayCount 14
— King PlayCount 20
-Possessor PlayCount 7
CultLeader PlayCount 3
Noble PlayCount 8
— Physician PlayCount 39
— Sheriff PlayCount 27
Mystic PlayCount 7
Fool PlayCount 1
Alchemist PlayCount 9
-Reaper PlayCount 10
Mercenary PlayCount 8
Sellsword PlayCount 1
Invoker PlayCount 3
Seeker PlayCount 1
Scorned PlayCount 2
Hunter PlayCount 8
Drunk PlayCount 7
Inquisitor PlayCount 4
-Sorcerer PlayCount 6

Added up the NKs since there is only one per game
—NK PlayCount 23

Which means I get Prince, King, Physician, Sheriff and NK practically twice as much as I do any of the other roles. I still see an issue here.

Read full topic

item.title: Im genuinely fed up!
item.dc:creator: AshKiwii
item.description:
I’ve been noting all the roles I get. I plan on posting after a whole week of games just to show how incredible it is that I so many good roles I miss out on because RNG is giving me the same roles constantly. Im still here. I just want to get enough info for it to be relevant.

Read full topic

item.title: Im genuinely fed up!
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
Hippolytus:

just note down what you get each time and post it. I think you’d be surprised at the level of variety you actually get.

I played 339 games of ToL. (I know so much time wasted)

Well just got my data like a savage. And guess what i got 39 times phys. I got drunk 13 times. Mastermind 25 times. Assasin 15 times. King 27 times. Princess 15. CW . Prince 15. Knight - 12 . Observer 8. Butler 14. Noble 19. Sheriff 14. Mystic 5. Fool 6. Alch 14. Reaper 7. MErc 7. So on and so forth.

Data shows that I have gotten phys 3 times as much My highest is phys - 39, mm - 25, king - 27 these are my only 20 + classes per game. SO I was right and YOU were wrong. (just pointing it out.)

@Hippolytus

Read full topic

item.title: Im genuinely fed up!
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
True randomness is only true if there’s a possibility of getting unfair results
Social deduction games have to have true RNG otherwise it’s just broken.
Sorry about your bad experience with the game, you seem like a player I’d like to play with sometime. Hopefully your bad streak wears off soon!

Read full topic

item.title: Im genuinely fed up!
item.dc:creator: PoisonedSquid
item.description:
Like I said before, I got Physician a lot more often and even though I got more variety in classes recently, Physician is still my most common role and it’s pretty cool to save people’s lives, I’ve become used to it(I like CW as well and I’ve been getting that more recently too)

Read full topic

item.title: Im genuinely fed up!
item.dc:creator: Nerbins
item.description:
I get Drunk a lot (No jokes, please). I originally disliked playing it, but I learned to like the class and I can now play it well.
If you get the class a lot, you can typically learn to play it better.
Is the randomiser bugged? I don’t think so, I think it’s just luck. Still, you probably have more experience as NK now because of your luck.

Read full topic
